content: NPR 24 kN ProPress® Pipe press jaw Press jaws for ProPress® press fittings up to 1-1/4. Compatible with Hilti NPR 24-22 pipe press tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Inserts for pressing, crimping & cutting- - ### FEATURES:Features Press jaws designed for ProPress® profile press fittings made by Viega® up to 1-1/4 Designed for the use with the Hilti NPR 24-22 pipe press tool, helping to ensure system compatibility Simpler maintenance management – equipped with NFC tag for easy identification and asset management via Hilti Connect and ON!Track Applications Pressing ProPress® copper press fittings and pipes up to 1-1/4 Pressing ProPress® stainless press fittings and pipes up to 1-1/4 *These values are system dependent. In order to ensure correct and safe pressing, consult the original instruction manual from the system supplier ### TECHNICAL DATA: Press profile: PP Service interval: 15.000 cycles or 1 year Technical Data | Press profile | PP | Service interval | 15.000 cycles or 1 year ### ITEMS- 2341671 - Press jaws NPR PC PP 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC PP 1 Press jaws - 2341672 - Press jaws NPR PC PP 1 1/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC PP 1 1/4 Press jaws - 2341629 - Press jaws NPR PC PP 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC PP 1/2 Press jaws - 2341670 - Press jaws NPR PC PP 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NPR PC PP 3/4 Press jaws
